stork.feather.util

Class Crawler<R extends Resource<?,R>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • stork.feather.Bell<R>
      • stork.feather.util.Crawler<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - The Resource type this Crawler operates on.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Future<R>

    public abstract class Crawler<R extends Resource<?,R>>
extends Bell<R>
    A Crawler crawls and operates on Resource trees. The crawling proceeds in an order according to some traversal mechanism and optionally produces a result. Crawler extends Bell, and will ring with the root Resource when crawling has finished.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Crawler

        public Crawler(R resource)
        Create a Crawler which will perform operations on the physical resources represented by resource. resource may be a non-singleton Resource in which case all resources it represents will be visited and operated on. Collection resources will not be operated on recursively.
        Parameters:
        resource - the Resource to traverse.

      • Crawler

        public Crawler(R resource,
       boolean recursive)
        Create a Crawler which will perform operations on the physical resources represented by resource. resource may be a non-singleton Resource in which case all resources it represents will be visited and operated on. Collection resources will be operated on recursively if recursive is true.
        Parameters:
        resource - the Resource to traverse.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Start the crawling process.

      • operate

        protected Bell operate(Path path,
           R resource)
        An operation that will be performed when a Resource is found. Generally, only one operate(...) method should be overridden in a subclass.
        Parameters:
        path - the selection Path of resource relative to the root Resource of the Crawler.
        resource - the Resource to operate on.
        Returns:
        A Bell that will ring when the operation is complete, or null if the operation completed instantly.

      • operate

        Returns:
